member.name: IWICProgressiveLevelControl.GetCurrentLevel
member.summary: Gets the decoder's current progressive level.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICProgressiveLevelControl.GetLevelCount
member.summary: Gets the number of levels of progressive decoding supported by the CODEC.
member.param: Indicates the number of levels supported by the CODEC.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICProgressiveLevelControl.SetCurrentLevel
member.summary: Specifies the level to retrieve on the next call to .
member.param: Specifies which level to return next. If greater than the total number of levels supported, an error will be returned.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICProgressiveLevelControl
member.summary: Exposes methods for obtaining information about and controlling progressive decoding.
